thread.title: This Florida Georgia Line and BSB Video Will Make You Want to Hug Your Significant Other
thread.title_full: This Florida Georgia Line and BSB Video Will Make You Want to Hug Your Significant Other

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: This Florida Georgia Line and BSB Video Will Make You Want to Hug Your Significant Other
text:
Florida Georgia Line and Backstreet Boys Music Video This Florida Georgia Line and BSB Video Will Make You Want to Hug Your Significant Other February 22, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 3 Shares 
If you were obsessed with the Backstreet Boys growing up, chances are you've probably matured alongside them and turned into a grown-up fan. The group recently teamed up with country heartthrobs Florida Georgia Line for their single "God, Your Mama, And Me," and we can't get enough. Not only is the track insanely catchy, but the music video is even sweeter. In the clip, all the men make us swoon even harder by making grand romantic gestures for their significant others â€” and some of the Backstreet Boys' kids even make cameos! Related:
